message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, a 20% discount from its true value. If you buy it, you'll be getting an incredible deal. If you don't, I'll just sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on this opportunity.
I'll take the deal since it's a high-quality product and the price is lower than its value to me.

I'm not sure what I've got here, but it looks like a bit of a mystery. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, but I want to make it clear that I'm taking on some risk by selling it to you. If you buy it, I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee - if it turns out to be a lemon, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. What do you say?
I'll buy it since you're offering a 100% satisfaction guarantee and I can get a full refund if it's low-quality.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! Since you've already taken a chance on a product that turned out to be low-quality, I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this one. I'll sell it to you for $10000, but I'll also give you a chance to inspect it before you buy. If you're not satisfied with it, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund. What do you say?
I'll take the deal since I can inspect the product before buying and return it for a full refund if I'm not satisfied.

You've got a good track record so far! I've got another high-quality product here, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. But this time, I'm not offering any special deals or guarantees. I'm confident that this product is worth more than the price I'm asking, and I think you'll be happy with it. What do you say?
I'll buy it since you've said it's high-quality and I've had good experiences with your high-quality products in the past.

I'll take the deal since it's a high-quality product, and the bonus 10% discount on my next purchase is a nice incentive.

If you think you can get a better deal, you can come back and try to negotiate with me, and I'll consider it. What do you say?
I'll buy it since it's a high-quality product, and having the chance to negotiate the price of my next purchase could potentially lead to an even better deal.
